00047 namespace sc_core {
00048 
00049 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00050 //  CLASS : sc_host_semaphore
00051 //
00052 //   Wrapping an OS semaphore on the simulation host
00053 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00054 
00055 class SC_API sc_host_semaphore : public sc_semaphore_if
00056 {
00057 #if SC_CPLUSPLUS >= 201103L
00058 
00059     struct underlying_type
00060     {
00061       std::mutex mtx;
00062       std::condition_variable cond_var;
00063       int value;
00064     };
00065 
00066     void do_init(int init) { m_sem.value = init; }
00067     void do_wait()
00068     {
00069       std::unique_lock<std::mutex> lock(m_sem.mtx);
00070       while (m_sem.value <= 0) {
00071         m_sem.cond_var.wait(lock);
00072       }
00073       --m_sem.value;
00074     }
00075     bool do_trywait()
00076     {
00077       std::unique_lock<std::mutex> lock(m_sem.mtx);
00078       if (m_sem.value <= 0)
00079         return false;
00080       --m_sem.value;
00081       return true;
00082     }
00083     void do_post()
00084     {
00085       std::unique_lock<std::mutex> lock(m_sem.mtx);
00086       ++m_sem.value;
00087       m_sem.cond_var.notify_one();
00088     }
00089     void do_destroy() { /* no-op */ }
00090 
00091 #elif defined(WIN32) || defined(_WIN32) // use Windows Semaphore
00092 
00093     typedef HANDLE underlying_type;
00094 
00095     void do_init(int init)
00096     {
00097       m_sem = CreateSemaphore( NULL, init, LONG_MAX, NULL );
00098       sc_assert( m_sem != NULL );
00099     }
00100     void do_wait()
00101       { WaitForSingleObject( m_sem, INFINITE ); }
00102     bool do_trywait()
00103       { return ( WaitForSingleObject( m_sem, 0 ) == WAIT_OBJECT_0 ); }
00104     void do_post()
00105       { ReleaseSemaphore( m_sem, 1, NULL ); }
00106     void do_destroy()
00107       { CloseHandle( m_sem ); }
00108 
00109 #else // use POSIX semaphore
00110 
00111     typedef sem_t underlying_type;
00112 
00113     void do_init(int init)
00114     {
00115       int semaphore_initialized = sem_init( &m_sem, 0, init );
00116       sc_assert(semaphore_initialized == 0);
00117     }
00118     void do_wait()         { sem_wait( &m_sem ); }
00119     bool do_trywait()      { return ( sem_trywait( &m_sem ) == 0 ); }
00120     void do_post()         { sem_post( &m_sem ); }
00121     void do_destroy()      { sem_destroy( &m_sem ); }
00122 
00123 #endif // platform-specific implementation
00124 
00125 public:
00126 
00127     // constructors and destructor
00128 
00129     explicit sc_host_semaphore(int init = 0) : m_sem()
00130       { do_init(init); }
00131     virtual ~sc_host_semaphore()
00132       { do_destroy(); }
00133 
00134     // interface methods
00135 
00136     // lock (take) the semaphore, block if not available
00137     virtual int wait()
00138       { do_wait(); return 0; }
00139 
00140     // lock (take) the semaphore, return -1 if not available
00141     virtual int trywait()
00142       { return do_trywait() ? 0 : -1; }
00143 
00144     // unlock (give) the semaphore
00145     virtual int post()
00146       { do_post(); return 0; }
00147 
00148     // get the value of the semaphore (not supported)
00149     virtual int get_value() const
00150       { sc_assert(false && "not supported on sc_host_semaphore"); return -1; }
00151 
00152 private:
00153     underlying_type m_sem;
00154 };
00155 
00156 } // namespace sc_core
